subject: Re: [junit] correct order of tests
msgSnippet: ... Nobody s asked yet.. but why do you need them in a specific order? Dave -- Dave Astels (dave@saorsa.com) Coauthor of A Practical Guide to eXtreme
messageBody:
On Thu, 2002-11-07 at 04:44, Wolfgang Egger wrote:

> Unfortunatley the TestProcedures have to be performed in a certain
> order. By default this is not ensured by the JUnit-framwork.

Nobody's asked yet.. but why do you need them in a specific order?

Dave
--
